description.jp: 神羅カンパニー総務部調査課 通称「タークス」のメンバーで レノとは昔からの相棒。彼とコンビを組んでクラウドたちの前に立ちはだかる。レノと同じく強いプロ意識の持ち主。口数が少なく しゃべるのは苦手な強面だが 情に厚く仲間思いな一面も。
description.gl: A member of the Turks, the Investigation Sector of Shinra's General Affairs Department, who causes trouble for Cloud and his friends. Similar to his partner, Reno, he has a strong sense of professionalism. Though a tough-looking man of few words, he is compassionate when it comes to his allies.

jp.text: 親愛なるきみたちに\n新しい武器を見せたいそうだ
タークスに……\nレノに……かんぱい

gl.text: He wants to show his affection for you all...with a new weapon.
Come on、 we've got work to do.

name.gl: コールアビリティ_ルード
name.jp: コールアビリティ_ルード

rank_up_desc.en: When using [Crash Hammer (C)]:\n• BRV stolen can overflow up to 150% Max BRV\n• Slightly raises HP recovery amount and limit

　HP回復量とHP回復上限小アップ
